result.reason: The application tracks disconnected sessions internally via HasDisconnectedSessions but does not expose this state to the user in the UI.
result.approach: Update the Connection Tree and Tab components to display a visual indicator (e.g., icon overlay) when the existing HasDisconnectedSessions property is true for a connection.
